Key Match Events: India won the toss and chose to bat first.
KL Rahul and Rohit Sharma opened for India.
David Miller and Aiden Markram led South Africa to victory.
South Africa defeated India by 5 wickets.
Ashwin took a wicket, dismissing Tristan Stubbs.
David Miller hit two sixes in a row in Ashwin's spell.
Hardik Pandya took the wicket of Aiden Markram.
Arshdeep Singh took two wickets in his first over.
Shami took the wicket of Temba Bavuma.
SuryaKumar Yadav scored a half-century for India.
Pre-Game Insights: India was in a strong position having won their first two matches against Pakistan and Netherlands.
The match was crucial for both India and South Africa as it would impact their fate in Group 2.
Post-Match Reflections: Spectacular performances by David Miller and Aiden Markram took South Africa up on the point chart by defeating India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was broadcasted on Star Sports and live streamed on Disney+ Hotstar.
The game was held at the Optus Stadium in Perth.
